All-In-One Furniture Procurement Solution from Ukrainian by USA.

On the ground Any professional can import furniture from Ukrainian. Small local restaurants and large importers.

You need furniture for your hotel, your business, an event, a public facility ? There are so many options available here in Ukrainian.

Our USA sourcing team will build the best offer for your specific needs. Asiaction French project managers and quality management team will make sure you receive the furniture in good conditions.

About us

Founded in 2008 by two Ukranian partners in Ukrain, Asiaction has become a leading sourcing company in the USA.

Our multicultural approach allows us to work on various international projects with great success.
